description: Video demo catalogue for animation styles - used by orchestrator and UI

demos.title: Beam Sweep Alpha - SaaS Landing
demos.description: Subtle horizontal light sweep across hero section. Perfect for tech products.

demos.title: Clip-Fade Radiance - Service Hero
demos.description: Elegant iris reveal for service-based businesses. Creates premium first impression.

demos.title: Card Morph FX - Portfolio Gallery
demos.description: Smooth card transitions for showcasing work. Engaging without overwhelming.

demos.title: Glass Distortion - Dashboard Entry
demos.description: Frosted blur entrance for app interfaces. Modern SaaS aesthetic.

demos.title: Quantum Glow - AI Feature
demos.description: Ethereal color-shifting glow for AI/tech products. Futuristic and premium.

demos.title: Split Reveal - Before/After
demos.description: Dramatic split transition for comparisons. Perfect for renovation/transformation.

demos.title: Parallax Depth - Brand Story
demos.description: Multi-layer scroll for immersive storytelling. Cinematic brand experience.

demos.title: Neon Edge - Gaming/Tech
demos.description: Cyberpunk neon borders for bold tech brands. High energy, attention-grabbing.

demos.title: Flashlight Cursor - Portfolio Explore
demos.description: Interactive spotlight for portfolio exploration. Engaging discovery experience.

demos.title: Soft Morph - Nonprofit/Health
demos.description: Gentle, organic transitions for trust-focused brands. Approachable and calming.

demos.title: Iris Open - Film/Creative
demos.description: Classic Hollywood iris transition. Perfect for video-centric and creative portfolios.

demos.title: Aurora Effect - Premium Brand
demos.description: Slow-moving aurora gradient for luxury and premium brands. Mesmerizing ambient effect.

categories.name: Hero
categories.description: First impression animations for landing sections

presetPrompts.beam-hero-light: Elegant website hero section with subtle horizontal light sweep animation, modern SaaS aesthetic, clean design, professional
presetPrompts.clip-reveal-premium: Premium service website hero with elegant iris reveal animation, sophisticated entrance, professional brand
presetPrompts.card-morph-gallery: Portfolio gallery with smooth card morphing transitions, modern grid layout, clean aesthetic
presetPrompts.glass-blur-enter: Dashboard interface with frosted glass blur entrance animation, modern app design, SaaS aesthetic
presetPrompts.quantum-ambient-loop: AI product feature section with ethereal color-shifting glow, futuristic tech aesthetic, premium feel
presetPrompts.split-compare-dramatic: Before/after comparison slider with dramatic split reveal, transformation showcase, impactful
presetPrompts.parallax-scroll-story: Brand storytelling page with multi-layer parallax scroll, cinematic depth, immersive experience
presetPrompts.neon-pulse-border: Gaming/tech interface with pulsing neon border effects, cyberpunk aesthetic, bold design
presetPrompts.cursor-spotlight-explore: Creative portfolio with interactive cursor spotlight, discovery experience, engaging navigation
presetPrompts.soft-organic-flow: Healthcare or nonprofit page with gentle organic morphing transitions, trustworthy and calming
presetPrompts.iris-film-reveal: Film portfolio with classic Hollywood iris open transition, cinematic entrance, creative brand
presetPrompts.aurora-slow-ambient: Premium brand hero with slow-moving aurora gradient background, luxurious ambient effect
